name: 劉夏如
objective:
文化專題（一）課程培養同學認識臺灣不同族群的生活文化，介紹各領域與各時期的文化特色，包括：原住民各族文化、荷西鄭氏時期的多元文化、農業移墾文化、日治臺灣的近代文化、臺灣近代社會變遷、當代文藝發展與變遷、大眾文化與全球化。
This course is designed to cultivate the students' understanding of life culture from different groups in Taiwan. Students will learn the introduction of cultural feature from each areas and periods. These cultural features include the aboriginal culture, the multicultural when Taiwan is under Dutch and Spanish rule and in the Zheng period, the culture of reclaiming agriculture, the modern culture when Taiwan is under Japanese rule, the society transition of modern Taiwan, the development and transition of the modern literature and art, popular culture and globalization.
